about_the_game:
Jans Token Pack 04 - Pirates 1

Pirates for your fantasy campaigns! Eleven female, fourteen male, two parrots and a monkey. Orcs, elves, humans and dwarfs are ready to set sail.
The ranged characters come in a crossbow and a gun version so they can be used in medieval fantasy or a fantasy world where gunpowder exists.
Converted by:   Jan Loos

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Jans Token Pack 04 - Pirates 1

Pirates for your fantasy campaigns! Eleven female, fourteen male, two parrots and a monkey. Orcs, elves, humans and dwarfs are ready to set sail.
The ranged characters come in a crossbow and a gun version so they can be used in medieval fantasy or a fantasy world where gunpowder exists.
Converted by:   Jan Loos

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.
